name: Distress Signal (neenaw)
description:
I made this game in 7 days for VimJam. I can't edit the submission until the game jams voting has ended, the game is a little rough in some parts. I will clean it up a bit when I can edit the submission.

Distress Signal

A space themed looter-shooter bullet hell where you must investigate a distress signal at precisely 1337 astronomical units away from earth. Space is not for the faint hearted.

TIPS

  • Asteroids provide cover.
  • Enemies can also destroy asteroids, which helps you mine.
  • Asteroids and Enemies are spawned in the direction you're facing.
  • When you've whittled down to 1 enemy practice dodging their shots.
 How To Play ACTIONKEYMovementW, A, S, DPrimary FireLeft Mouse ButtonMissilesRight Mouse ButtonBoostSpace
Known Issues
  • 16:10 screens cut off the sides. Sorry Mac users.
  • The credits links in the  HTML5  will break the game. Thanks WebGL.
Credits A Game By neenaw (Neelesh Dooraree) Music Metaphazic Laser SFX Samuel Burt Laser SFX GamingSoundEffects Explosion SFX All Sounds Collectible Effect iggchane
